snippet.title: Total War: WARHAMMER III - Harald Hammerstorm Trailer
snippet.description:
The man, the myth, the legend... it's Harry the Hammer! 🔨

Yes, the mighty Harald Hammerstorm has joined the fray as a Warriors of Chaos FLC Legendary Hero in Total War: WARHAMMER III as part of Update 3.1!

👀 Find out how to claim him here: https://support.sega.com/hc/en-gb/articles/15538082914321
📜 Update 3.1 Release Notes: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/tww3-update-310

FORGE OF THE CHAOS DWARFS AVAILABLE NOW - https://store.warhammer.totalwar.com/

Play now with PC Game Pass: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9NGGB0GZPB9D
Buy it on the Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwc735wd9ck
Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710/Total_War_WARHAMMER_III/
Purchase on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/total-war-warhammer-3
Any questions? Check out the FAQ: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq/

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMER #warhammer3 

Follow us on social media:
➤ https://discord.gg/totalwar
➤ http://www.facebook.com/totalwar
➤ http://www.twitter.com/totalwar
➤ http://www.instagram.com/totalwarofficial
➤ http://www.twitch.tv/totalwar

Video type: In-engine Cinematic
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤ http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
